name: Dextrose
comments: Dextrose Powder (Monohydrate), typically with a moisture content of around 8%.

name: Invert Sugar
comments: Sources differ significantly on the exact composition and POD/PAC values. This is a middle ground between various sources, including Underbelly's sugars chart (https://under-belly.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/sugars11.png), Ice Cream 7th Edition (Table 3.4, page 67), and Ice Cream Calculator (https://icecreamcalc.com/).

name: Honey
comments: Composition values were taken from the sugar profile in Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honey#Nutrition). The resulting POD/PAC values roughly align with those in Underbelly's sugars chart (https://under-belly.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/05/sugars11.png), Ice Cream 7th Edition (Table 3.4, page 67), and Ice Cream Calculator (https://icecreamcalc.com/), which differ slightly among themselves.

name: HFCS 42
comments: High Fructose Corn Syrup 42 (HFCS 42) composition values were taken from Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High-fructose_corn_syrup#Production). The resulting POD/PAC values match those in Ice Cream 7th Edition (Table 3.4, page 67) and Ice Cream Calculator (https://icecreamcalc.com/).
